# South Carolina House of Representatives District 99

## About

South Carolina House of Representatives District 99 is a state legislative district
in South Carolina. The district is located in Charleston County.

## Current representative

**Michael Brown** (Democratic) is the current representative for this district.
He has served since 2016.

## Previous elections

### 2024 election

**Michael Brown** (Democratic) ran unopposed.

### 2022 election

**Michael Brown** (Democratic) defeated **Sarah Thompson** (Republican)
with 62% of the vote.

### 2020 election

**Michael Brown** (Democratic) defeated **David Lee** (Republican)
with 59% of the vote.

## District demographics

The district has a population of approximately 42,000 residents.
The district is majority Democratic by registration.
